name: Dino-Zone
description:
If you have trouble with the browser version, try the standalone downloads

Made for Virtual Pet Jam (Dogpit Jam 2022)

How to Play

Keep your dino's stats in the green!

The game's unfinished, so all you can really do is enjoy your dino pet! And isn't that its own reward?

Keyboard: Arrow keys + Enter

Story

You're the newest caretaker at the local zoo, and have been entrusted with taking care of a very peculiar exhibit. Will you rise to the challenge?

Credits

Programming: SupSuper
Art: Rose Davis
Music: GravySurfKing
